articles.author: Devdiscourse
articles.title: Major US Domestic News: Gun Laws, Defense Policy, and Political Milestones
articles.description: Recent US domestic news includes the Supreme Court's rejection of a bump stock ban, the House's approval of a defense policy bill with divisive provisions, the DOJ's decision on Merrick Garland contempt charges, Trump's 78th birthday highlighting age in the 2024 race, and other significant events.
articles.content:
Following is a summary of current US domestic news briefs.
US Supreme Court rejects federal ban on gun 'bump stocks'
The U.S. Supreme Court on Friday declared unlawful a federal ban on "bump stock" devices that enable semiautomatic weapons to fire ra... [5877 chars]

articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.title: Trump once defied the NRA to ban bump stocks. He now says he 'did nothing' to restrict guns
articles.description: Donald Trump’s campaign has found itself defending a Supreme Court decision to strike down a ban that he himself had hailed as an achievement on gun control six years ago.
articles.content: Less than six years ago, then-President Donald Trump took on the influential gun lobby after the deadliest massacre in modern U.S. history. He announced that he had told the National Rifle Association that “bump stocks are gone,” arguing they “turn l... [4543 chars]

articles.author: CBS News
articles.title: Supreme Court strikes down Trump-era ban on bump stocks for firearms
articles.description: The Supreme Court ruled 6-3 that the Bureau of Alcohol, Tobacco, Firearms and Explosives exceeded its authority when it issued the rule outlawing bump stocks.
articles.content:
Washington — The Supreme Court on Friday invalidated a federal rule enacted during the Trump administration that outlawed bump stocks, devices that greatly increase the rate of fire of semi-automatic weapons.
The 6-3 ruling found that the Bureau of A... [8945 chars]

articles.description: Tesla CEO Elon Musk discussed his relationship with former President Trump during the electric vehicle giant's shareholder meeting on Thursday, confirming that the pair have had conversations and revealing some of what they have discussed.

Bob Good (R-VA), who chairs the far-right House Freedom Caucus, is competing in a tough primary race against a Republican state senator endorsed by former President Donald Trump. articles.content: Former President Donald Trump is in Palm Beach, Florida, on Friday to deliver a speech on his birthday at 7 p.m. Trump addressed his fan club, affectionately named Club 47, for the would-be 47th president. When the club was founded in 2018, it went b... [496 chars]

articles.description: The 45th president will address members of his "Club 47" fan group at a sold-out birthday bash at the Palm Beach County Convention Center.
articles.content:
Former President Donald Trump celebrated his birthday Friday night by mocking President Biden’s recent missteps in Italy as he represents the US at the G7 summit.

articles.title: Democratic Pennsylvania congressman caught calling Trump voters ‘fascists’
articles.description: Rep. Chris Deluzio (D-PA) is under fire for an unearthed remark in which he called Trump voters "budding blood-and-soil fascists.”
articles.content:
PITTSBURGH — Rep. Chris Deluzio (D-PA) is under fire after widespread airing of four-year-old remarks in which he called former President Donald Trump’s voters a “horde of budding blood-and-soil fascists.”

Former President Donald Trump is set to speak to supporters at a Club 47 gathering in Florida for his 78th birthday at 7 p.m., with the livestream beginning at 5 p.m.

articles.author: Washington Examiner
articles.title: Trump’s tariffs-only tax plan is brilliant politics
articles.description: Donald Trump recently floated a tax plan that would abolish the income tax and raise tariffs on foreign goods. It's a brilliant political strategy.
articles.content:
As he attempts to reclaim his old job, former President Donald Trump teased a new tax plan this week that would see the personal income tax abolished and replaced by an increase in tariffs.

articles.author: The New York Times
articles.title: It’s Donald Trump’s 78th Birthday. He Isn’t Happy About It.
articles.description: As he vies to become the oldest person to be elected president of the United States, former President Donald J. Trump said this birthday was one he wanted to ignore.
articles.content:
“Donald hates his birthdays,” Ivana Trump once said of her former husband.
He seemed to hate this one, on Friday, especially. He looked genuinely upset earlier this week when his supporters sang an early “Happy Birthday” to him at a rally in Las Vega... [830 chars]

articles.description: Polling industry insiders in the U.S. agree on one thing — the criminal conviction of Donald Trump has not had a dramatic effect on the presidential election. But here's what they have found.
